I have been in the share market for 7 years. Well trading is all about long time & short time charts, global sentiments etc. I have followed a lot of channels personally and most of them will lure you by showing big profits. Screenshot (if they never make a loss, they must be god).

First of all let us understand the reason why people lose money!

  • No stop loss, No logic behind trades, No risk management or pre-defined target, No discipline in Trading.

If you’re new trader do follow these steps:

  1. If you are a beginner do not enter trades before 9.15–9.45am. Let the market settle as we may see huge volatility in the initial hour & be ready with the list of the stocks, charts, indicators before market.
  2. Stop loss and target is must, Always put stop loss to each trade. Having knowledge of Support and Resistance of index as it will help you in holding or booking profits.
  3. Always start with paper trade. This will help you to get better and better in trading.

I have followed a lot of channels personally and most of them fake it for money by luring you by showing big profits SS(if they never make a loss, they must be god).   2. LIVE TRADING TRICKS(puneeth shetty sir) - 1700 members. He post’s his live personal trades & also update real-time adjustments throughout the trading hours. He post the video screenshot of the entire screen so we can crosscheck the time with the market. He trades for himself & doesn't have any membership guess that's why he is so transparent. Should we join Telegram premium channels for intraday and option calls?

Several traders find intraday equity trading as an attractive option because the charges levied by the broker for the stocks traded are less than in the regular delivery system trading. Also, achieving high margin gains is possible in a day trading, wherein transacting multiple times of your investment value is permitted based on the policy of the brokerage firms. Moreover, the other benefit one gets is that these stocks are not carried overnight. Hence, the share price fluctuation due to external events will not affect the trader. While intraday equity trading is seen as a smart option to make quick money on a daily basis, traders should join the best Telegram premium channels for intraday and option calls to understand the day trading strategies to make money gains and avoid chances of losses as this form of trading is riskier than investing in the regular stock market. Are telegram channels for intraday trading reliable and give any profits or it's all just a scam to make followers?

THE STOCK MANTRA - With over 78k subscribers, they share their market view which is always neutral. SO no matter market falls or zooms they would come back post market hours & say “As we said in the morning”. It becomes very irritating for you as a retail investor who followed what they preached earlier & made loss.

Above you can see the SS of their recommendation. Now this channel shares such 5-6 shares on a given day. It becomes a 99% success ratio for a channel to take credit if stocks fall or even if it goes up. And they quote, “As we said in the morning”. It doesn't make any sense.

2)

Profit is profit - They have around 1000 followers. They keep sharing SS of profits shared by multiple people. Trust me, the day their channel would be made public all the poor traders who bought their membership will come forward & report them.

Above you can see their daily post on channel. They’re very smart to mention the perfect premium to buy a particular option or stock with basic & very little SL. For example, if ONGC is trading @100. They would recommend buying with SL of 99.

1st scenario -- If ONGC crashes they would say only 1Re loss cuz of SL

2nd scenario -- If ONGC goes up, they would keep on displaying the rockets, fire, money sign every second & take credit of the HIGH ongc made (as if they advised to exit at high). These are bad practices and innocent retail investors fall for it unknowingly.

3)

MKJ talks 4 investments - He has more than 1.40L subscribers. When nifty was trading at 7500 last March he committed to his followers & members that nifty will crash below 5000, with full conviction. (You can try to paper trade his recommendations. ) For example, he once strongly recommended to buy AIRTEL future at 510 & unfortunately Airtel fell to 450 levels. Now I'm not saying one can't be wrong about their view. But the mistake that he made was telling his subscribers not to place an SL & when it had fallen alot & a few days left for expiry he shamelessly said I’ll buy AIRTEL stocks because I have money. Now just imagine the plight of poor retail traders who trade on margin.

4)

Voodoo trading --- Now I don't understand what his problem is. Just like STOCK MANTRA, he too will share all the available scenarios of the stock & index. So kuch bhi ho jaye he would say “Maine bola tha”. He does training & courses teaching students. I can't comment on his teachings but the recommendations are completely false done on telegram channels.

I would like to end this by saying I didn't call them scam because people(traders) are themselves enrolling to these channels & these so called "social media experts" are taking undue advantage of human nature. What I dislike is during such difficult financial times of everyone's life these channels are monetising with wrong intention. You can follow some free telegram channels i follow like “POWER OF STOCKS - SUBASHISH SIR” & “LIVE TRADING TRICKS - PUNEETH SHETTY SIR “ is good too. My only advice for the new retail traders is to paper trade the recommended calls & tips & track their calls before showering your hard earned money.
